storyInfo: Patriot stands like a mountain before Rhodes Island. The only way to cross… is to overcome him.

attributes.content: It’s been a long time, Buldrokkas'tee.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dame, Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Why don’t... you age?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Shieldguards. Guerrillas. Stand by. Hold position.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Roger.
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Lord.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: The way you talk... is that because of an infected organ in your larynx?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No. Just, over time, became like this. I can’t, speak smoothly, anymore.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Dame... I never thought, I’d see you, again.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I remember, faintly. When my people, left. You and, Her Majesty, didn’t stop us.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: That was a long, long time ago.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I was, in my prime. Now I know, too sudden. I was wrong, about the King.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: ...You’ll still call her 'Majesty' and 'King.'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: A king, is a king.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: When I left, she wasn’t. Now, she has passed.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You still distinguish the King of Kazdel and the Emperor of Ursus.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Decorum. War does not, muddle, my thoughts. Who I served? All gone.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Ursus now, is my homeland, too. My liege, buried in Ursus. Vast land.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: ...To long, Dame. When we left...
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: My people were, not yet withered. Still, it was not, long.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: But you... no change. The years, did not change you.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Not true. The years have changed us all, Buldrokkas'tee. I’m not the same woman I was before.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Buldrokkas'tee... why did you leave Kazdel?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Why I left, I think, you will laugh.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I left, because, I hated killing.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: ...But for my life, I have killed.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: All that you’ve been through has only tempered your will. Your blood still flows in your veins. I will not laugh at you. You’ve earned respect.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: High praise, Dame. I failed to avoid, killing. I did, kill so many.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Dame, this name... Do you know, how I got it?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Your followers consider you a true warrior, fighting for Ursus. You fight injustice, slavery, bloodshed and oppression for the future of Ursus.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Do you agree?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Shakes his head)
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Even if war, is necessary, such a title, is trouble.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: For many, we started war. But war, is murder.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: The war ends. If it, truly, ends. We should, all die.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: But war never ends.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But I will die.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: But, for my death, I want, meaning. I want to see, for Ursus, for the Infected, another future.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I asked, many times, of my people, Kazdel. You and, Her Majesty, worked together, for many years. She trusted you.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: So, I too, trust you.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You led, Rhodes Island, here. Not for blood.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: ...But them, those two. They stink, of my daughter. Her death.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Mr. Patriot...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No. No more.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Do you seek vengeance on Rhodes Island, Patriot?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No, Dame. Not vengeance.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Why take, vengeance, for her, actions?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: That was, her path. She chose. No matter, where it ended.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.options: Your daughter fought us with everything she had!;She was strong.;FrostNova had an iron will.
And she approved of us too.

attributes.content: Quiet.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: ...Mr. Patriot?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She’s, so young. Only knows, blind trust.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: The truth, we believed, in the end, is exposed. Only a few, wolves, in sheep’s clothing.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Mr. Patriot! Miss FrostNova gave her life, her Arts... everything...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Miss FrostNova let go of everything just to prove herself, her anger, her ideals...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Her life had meaning!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Enough. Not your place, to say this.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Amiya, don’t. Say no more.)
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What, do you know?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: If my daughter, was not, terminal... Killing you, would be easy, for her. Like slicing wheat, with a sickle.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: What you, endured, I do not care.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: It means, nothing. It proves, nothing.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.options: Talulah has set the core city on a collision course for Lungmen!

attributes.content: And is she, declaring it, Ursus territory?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.options: How did you know?!;......;Seems like we can skip that part.

attributes.content: Patriot... how... then why...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The puppetmaster, has many tools. Puppetmasters, think alike.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: But I cannot, let you through. Reunion, cannot destroy, itself.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I won’t, betray again. Or they, the Infected, the struggle, are for nothing. They die.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Even if, Talulah, has gone mad...
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: How do I tell, the Infected, their leader, is mad? A traitor?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: How do I say, she is wrong now, but once right? How do I say, she, who you follow, must now die?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I won’t let, Reunion, become 'Infected, civil war, then nothing.' I will not.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: But Reunion won’t be able to carry its own weight. And besides, Talulah has been working secretly to destroy Reunion from within.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You are right, Dame Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: And so, you are here.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I prepared, to face, many types of foe.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: But I did not, expect, in the end, to fight Infected.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: ...Is this really what you choose?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Buldrokkas'tee... You don’t have to die.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Choose? I have only, one choice.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: To kill you.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Patriot, we don’t need to throw more lives away! This isn’t like it was with Miss FrostNova! No matter who wins, this battle is playing right into the enemy’s hands!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Wrong.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Cautus, this, is war.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You want me, to stop. Why, should I stop?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I fought far, too many wars.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: As the, Wendigo, of Ursus... barbarians. Flayers, ripped flesh from bone, vicious herds, we cleansed.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Monsters. Twisted, stinking limbs, eyes in the, hundreds. Fingers in, the thousands. We slaughtered.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Warriors. Victoria, with steam armor. Kazimierz, with Silverlance Pegasi. Laterano, with Apostolic, Gun-Knights. All of them, we defeated, utterly.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: But we cannot, defeat ourselves. Cannot defeat, the Empire’s greed. Cannot defeat, our people’s deaths.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: We, the Wendigos, are the Sarkaz, closest, to death.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You are stained, with my daughter's death.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: In this world, there are fates, worse than death.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Why should I stop? Who dares, test me? My virtue?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: They called me, righteous. Should I, accept?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Fate thinks me weak. Do I suffer it? They called me strong. Should I bear it?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Traitor, rebel, butcher, guardian...
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: All of them, like 'Patriot.' On the battlefield, they are nothing, but scraps.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You killed her. I’ll kill you.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: It is not, revenge. I have no heart, for vengeance.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: My daughter just, gave up the fight.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.options: No!;......;That’s not how it is, sir.

attributes.content: If not, then how? She gave her life, and you still live?!
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I, will not, give up.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I only know, what I see. I only know, what I hold.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I don’t fight you, for my daughter.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: ...But I loathe fate.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I will fell it, crush it, grind it to dust.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: If fate, lets you, make me turn.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I would rather, never turn, back.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: ...Captain! Are you really going to...?
attributes.name: Shieldguard

attributes.content: Anyone who, thinks me, dishonorable. Stand now, challenge me.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: But if you, value your life... We part, here.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I don’t want, for you, a foolish death. I won many times. I know this, too well.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You can’t...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Buldrokkas'tee, don’t be stupid, you can live on.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dame, you too, have tasted loss.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: And so, could you, stand by, and watch?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: —You—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: My blood, no longer, serves her. Yes. My country... is Ursus.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: But when she, died. We heard it... that long, long gasp.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: So you could feel it...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That was the moment with the pulse containing her Arts spread through the body of every Sarkaz in the world.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It was only an instant. But you felt it. That means your blood... is ancient enough.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So ancient that, I am alone.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I never thought, born in Kazdel, never Infected... Then, an old man, I tasted it, Oripathy.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Is that right?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: We all know, Dame. We all know. Things in this world, do not happen, because they are, right.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: In fact, most things, are mistakes, again.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: My men said, I can fix them. In fact, they are too many. There is no, looking back.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Do you fight, to this day, for what, you lost, Dame?
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I think, no.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I think, you lost, and you refuse, to lose more.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: My daughter, has passed.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: —I fight not, for her death. I fight, for the living, for all Infected, to the end.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Reunion, cannot fail.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Reunion must, liberate. All Infected.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Are you sending messages for him and his men?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: What will you say to him?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: ...You’re trying to set up the guerrillas. You’re... you’re going to turn the Ursus Infected against them, to kill them.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: You know they won’t raise a hand against the civilians.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Hate is the strongest weapon. It’s a killer.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: But he won’t die.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: He’s Patriot... he’s all the greatest legends summed up in one man. I’ve seen his armor. I’ve seen him swing a weapon.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: He can’t die! He and his people are the strongest fighters in all Reunion!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: You want to kill the Infected. You devils never cared about life, but he does!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: He’s Ursus... he’s Sarkaz, and he’s Infected! But none of those qualities push him to do wrong!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: He’s not just Ursus, he’s not just Sarkaz, he’s not just an Infected. He’s the Patriot, just the Patriot.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: He’ll beat you, he’ll block your attacks, spit on your insults, regroup the Infected, and cleanse their hate...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: He’s Patriot, and he won’t die.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: And you’re a bunch of maggots, dancing on the strings of the disgusting schemers running this show.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: You’re talking like that because you know you’re gonna die.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: And you’re definitely right about that.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Patriot’s pretty tough. But you’re not. You’re gonna die.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: So you, will not pass. I will not, allow it.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: To go through, central district, you have to, kill me.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Otherwise, my guerrillas, will hunt. And I, will be here, strangling you, to death.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You will die, at my hands.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Only if, you kill me, will your value, be known. Otherwise, you are only, intruders.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.options: What’s wrong with you?!;...How unreasonable.;I’m afraid I don’t really follow.

attributes.content: Of course, I don’t believe, you have any, value.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I don’t know, how you could, resist, my people’s, witchcraft. But you will not, survive, Ursus tactics.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.options: You really hate us that much?

attributes.content: I don’t hate, anyone.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I just don’t, trust you. I cannot, trust.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Even you, Lord. You brought...
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You won’t approve of us.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I don’t believe, in coincidences.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: War.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: War, does not care. Not about right, or wrong.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: It does not, care about, the suffering, or the oppressed, or the enslaved. Off the battlefield, there are. On the battlefield, there are not.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You must prepare, for the battlefield.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Whoever dies, is wrong.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I can’t... I can’t understand him...!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: What is he saying... why do we have to fight?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Fight, or be crushed.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Resist, and be crushed.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Unless, you defeat, me.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: If fate, stands with me, I kill you. Then I, shall kill it. So it cannot, mock anyone, ever again.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: If fate, stands with you.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I can only, go forward. Advance.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: All operators, fall back, immediately!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I step forward.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Our target is an Infected commander of the Reunion movement, code name: 'Patriot.'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: His armor, his strength, his stature, far surpass anything you would expect of a warrior.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Originium may have taken over many of his physiological functions. The Originium in what was once his larynx... is a product of the high rate of crystallization happening inside his body.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That’s the most we’ve been able to gather from our intel.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I have reason to believe that a typically fatal wound will not do any significant damage to him, as the Originium will grow and replace tissue damage!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Wendigos naturally exhibit an extremely high metabolic and repair capacity. And from where we stand, we don’t know whether his infection is causing him pain, or is a benign mutation.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But no matter how resilient he may be, we have to kill him.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Only by killing him can we get through the central district, reach the bridge, and stop the enemy’s exploitation of Reunion!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: His guards have been confused by his actions. This is our last chance.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. Kal’tsit...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: What’s happening?;...Why?;How did it come to this?

attributes.content: ...We’re just a fork in his road. All that we’ve built means nothing to him.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We’re a choice just like 'go kill Talulah right now.' But I think that one carries more weight to him, might be worth further investigation.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: To put it frankly, he’s looking down on us.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Even with Dr. Kal’tsit here...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even the Emperor of Ursus himself couldn’t get him to bow his head, let alone me.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We’ll have to use his death... to open his eyes, and make him see all that we’ve done, and make him realize that we’re stronger than him.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But there’s no way he himself could ever... change. Everything else, all that you value, is too fragile for him. It can’t bear his weight.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hellagur from Azazel misjudged this Sarkaz’s character.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...No matter how noble Buldrokkas’tee may be, no matter how much he carries on his shoulders, he is an indomitable warrior, first and foremost.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: FrostNova trusted you, so she gave the last bit of her life to you... But Patriot does not.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: He doesn’t trust. He only trusts himself.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (...Even outwardly.)
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Prepare for battle. It all comes down to battle now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: —Only war can kill him.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Wise choice, Lord.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Guerrillas, regroup.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: You have only, a few minutes left.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I say, no more.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: I seek no, understanding. I only, win wars.
attributes.name: Patriot

attributes.content: Defying all comprehension, the monstrously fearsome warrior stands before you.
But, you remember, there is another monstrous warrior who comprehends everything, standing right beside you...
Amiya grips your hand tightly.
Rhodes Island, I advance.
attributes.name: Patriot
